Articles.Content: Is there any way to change the F12 Debug menu to a different key?

Not that I know of. Why?

My F12 is already set for brightness so it only does the brightness.

If your keyboard has all function keys assigned to "system functions" (brightness, volume, wireless on/off, etc) then it usually also has an "FN" key that allows you to use them as a "regular" function key. You should also be able to toggle the keyboard preference between "system functions" and "F1-F12"

Is there any way to change the F12 Debug menu to a different key?

I don't think you can remap the debug menu as there isn't an option for it in the settings.cfg file (or at least I haven't found it).

If you're actually trying to get the debug menu up, the key is Alt-F12 (not just F12). Maybe that will help.
